players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Whoa… Bob’s already dead. That’s rough. We’ve got 1 mafioso among the 3 of us now. I want to hear first thoughts: Alice, Charlie—who feels off to you and why? Let’s be systematic before we rush a vote."
Charlie: "Based on my investigation as the detective, Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, why target Diana right away? Let's hear from Diana before we make any decisions."

Diana: "Charlie claiming detective this fast smells fake. If he were real, he’d fear dying tonight after outing himself. Alice, think: he rushed to a single push without questions. Let’s get both of us to talk details."
You: "Charlie, if you are truly the detective, can you share why you investigated Diana specifically? Diana, can you explain why Charlie would accuse you if he isn't the detective?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
